CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR( TotalTime24HrRollup__c )) + ' h ' + TEXT( FLOOR( ( ROUND(TotalTime24HrRollup__c,2)-FLOOR(TotalTime24HrRollup__c) ) * 60 ) ) + ' min'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the total hours from the field "Total Time (24 hr, rollup summary)" in hours and minutes
CustomField.label: Total Time (24 hr, Display Hrs & Min)
